Class BatchDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.BatchDAO

  • public class BatchDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    BatchDAO needs to be able to: getAll Batches add Batch batch is Available get Batch by project name update a batch get next available batch NEEDS TO WORK WITH SAMPLE IMAGE
